event.description:
Sundrunch is preparing to revel in the colours and flavours of authentic spices that trigger your cravings for the famous street food from the heart of India. 

From chaats to momos and parathas to kebabs, live food carts and flea bazaar, Byg Brewski Brewing Company will take you on a trip down the Khao Gallis of Delhi this Sunday

For reservations, call: 080-46809796

review.review_text: Amazing place party with friends and family including your parents.   Only thing I will object that smokers should go and smoke in their respective permissible area not at their table.
We had a great time and nice climate with nice service with tasty food enjoyed a lot. Thanks to tapas for his humble service. Feeling great to visit again and again

Thank you Kalam for everything !! One of the best place to hang out with friends . Ya definately suddenly our dining experience changed into a adventure . Heavy rain it was !! Never the less we got everything we wanted . I would like to espcially thank mr. Kalam who was taking care of our table .Saluting the guy who gave all the attention . He really did rescue ya from the rain . This place has best food . best ambience and best service . totally satisfied !! Thank you
A great experience and a perfectly nice place for a date. I was out with my husband and it started raining and then we bonded over everything, the music food and the ambience
Good ambience and good crowd Waiter was tapas And the food was so damn good The mac and cheese and the risotto was really damn good and the drinks on point

review.review_text: Nice place to hangout..... good food, good interior, good ambience, good behaviour by staff (Yokchen).... what else u need 😊 I have given 4 star because I believe that, there is always chance for betterment...😊
It was really nice ambience and serves provided by basanta. He so kind to fulfill all the needs of mine !!!! Must visit place in bangalore !!!!

Excellent ambience, great taste, quick service, excellent staff behaviour. Have come with my family and great satisfaction. Recommend to visit with the family. Thanks Bangalore cafe for a great eating experience.

restaurant.name: ShakesBierre

location.address: Level 5, Eva Mall, Brigade Road, Bangalore

restaurant.timings: 12 Noon to 12 Midnight (Mon-Thu, Sun), 12 Noon to 1 AM (Fri-Sat)

event.title: Unlimited Beer @699
event.description: Ladies and gentlemen, visit the Bard’s Hamlet to enjoy our freshly brewed 'Signature Beers’ at INR 699.
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

review.review_text: Went here on a Friday afternoon, really good place, 5/5 for ambience, really courteous staff, their in-house brews are really good, we ordered Romano pizza and two other starters which was not so good, overall 4/5 would recommend this place!

ShakesBierre – A exemplary rooftop pub in town which would leave a captivating memory down the pub scene in Namma Bengaluru  For those who are passionate about crafted beer, palatable food and good music ShakesBierre hits the bull’s-eye.  The moment we step in you would be startled to see the entire space being flawlessly setup in a Shakespeare era – yes you heard me right!  The entire space is setup in old British era - right from dim lighting to art work on the walls, a huge painting that depicts the entire world as a stage. The chairs, furniture and murals at every nook and corner would for sure transport you back to native British era.  I would say they have put forth loads of efforts for the interiors and décor to theme it as a classic Shakespeare themed one.  Ambiance – 5/5 (For sure deserves a huge round of applause)  We choose to visit this place during weekday dinner and I was quite surprised to see this place running to a full house at 8pm on a weekday.  We were greeted politely by the staff and seated in a place of our choice.  Drinks – 4/5  Beer – I personally loved the Ale Othello – (Indian pale ale), in cocktails I would adore “The Devil gets his Due”  Ale Othello – (Indian pale ale) -4/5  This one has citrus and tropical fruit notes to it and best part is it has a fine balance of sweetness and bitterness from the hops.  Do try this one with Lamb chops which is a perfect pairing.  The Devil get’s his Due – Request the staff to present this one right in front of you and then see the dramatics around it.  With whiskey as its base it has a right mix of sweetness and a bit of sourness then presented well by adding apple smoke – the first sip gives it a naïve smoky feel - a perfect one!  Food – Appetizing one  (Small plates) – 5/5   Tawa Lamb Chops – Just the right ones, the meat just falls of the bone and is cooked to perfection. The lamb chops are marinated in rich spices along with ginger , garlic paste. This has a rustic feel to it.  Sambal Prawns – the melt in the mouth ones loved them  ShakesBierre chips – A fine mix of Tapioca, raw banana and potato chips, which are seasoned with simple spices   Large Plates: 4/5  Vietnamese Lamb Curry – A perfect example of main course which is a show stopper  Lamb shanks cooked for a long time in Vietnamese styled curry along with coconut milk and then topped with curry leaves. This one is just wow.  Mushroom Rendang – A simple Indonesian rendang curry cooked in rich coconut milk with assorted mushrooms and lemongrass. A strong hint of lemongrass is evident.  Goan Fish Curry – A simple fish curry cooked with kokum, coconut milk in ground spices. Goes well with steamed rice.  Desserts: 5/5 (Sinful ones)   Baked Alaska – A classic one which is then slightly flambéed with Brandy, this one did the trick and boy trust me this is one such dessert you should miss to try when you are at ShakesBierre.  Baked Blueberry cheesecake – Yet another classic New York style baked cheese cake. This is spot on with right amount of sweetness quo.  Service – 4.5/5  The staffs are really polite and dutiful in here. They are well versed with the menu.  Best part I remember our attendant – Bijit – always has a smiling face and makes sure you would have a wonderful dining experience out there. He has recommended few dishes and they were just wow. People like him make that difference.  VFM -5/5  ShakesBierre for me is place with skillfully crafted beers and cocktails to accompany a delectable selection of edible treats with native origin.   Perfect place with a gastronomic masterpiece along with an upbeat British era interior, aided by some great music tracks being played.  Price for two will come up to 2000 rs /- with a drink  The service is worth an applaud and food is delicious. Will come back soon to relish other treats.
everything seemed perfect....the staff were courteous...food was exceptional and the brew was really good....would like to visit this place again.. ..

Lovely place to chill out with your friends and their poetic ambience it eye catchy. The food was amazing and the Zomato gold makes it much better. Bapan was really polite and friendly. Would definitely come here again!
Bapan again being so helpful with everything,give the man a raise Thanks to shakesbierre for availing zomato gold and also for having a great atmosphere

location.address: 348/1/2, Survey 62, 29th Main, 2nd Stage, Lake Road, BTM, Bangalore

event.title: Stories Sunday Bollywood Brunch
event.description:
A Sunday you'll remember! We're turning your noon into one filled with a blown out Bollywood themed Sunday brunch.

From 200+ food options, unlimited liquor, freshly brewed beer to live dhol, photo booth & more.. this is a moment you cannot miss out on.

Timing: 12:00-4:00 pm 
Contact: 080 4680 9326
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

review.review_text: We were a group of 8 that went here after I announced that I have to checkout some pubs in South Bangalore, for an article I'm writing for an expat blog. The ambience is probably the only thing that gets people here, one time! We had to wait 45 minutes for just our beer. Then we had a word with the management and when I said " Hey, I'll have to write an honest review " Mr. Shubroto ( or a name that sounds just like that) the manager, said " write whatever you want" ... Well OK! Food - Over priced ( 750 for a platter, take a look at the picture) 2/5 Ambience - 5/5 Service - I'd give a negative if I could! Beer - 4/5

The ambience simply takes the breath away as soon as you enter this place. Surrounded by greenery everywhere, you get a plush atmosphere. Coming to the food, had ordered the mutton pepper fry and the Chakhna platter for starters. Both were good but the mutton pepper fry was by far the best I have had so far. Also ordered for a Meaty Pizza which was really good and cheesy and was the right portion size to be shared between 2 ppl. Felt they could have added more variety in their non veg selection by including Beef/Pork. Although being a brewery, they had amazing cocktails to offer to the non beer drinkers like me. Ordered for a Whiskey Smash and just kept repeating it. They could further enhance the experience by serving Sheesha as quite a lot of us would like to visit places which offer all of it under one roof.

We were tended with extreme care by Victor, Senior Associate at this place. Food n drinks were catered in a reasonable time. Had a lovely time! The surprise was when there was a sudden spray of fine mist that converted a normal brewery to a brewery in the hills! Lovely experience!
Delicious food amazing decor and great service by Mr. Neeraj. The brewed beer is worth a mention . The IPA beer is a must try.  Ambiance is awesome and the music is great. Worth the weekend visit

review.review_text: Nice place if you like super crowded and loud pubs... It's got a good location and very spacious...but the place gets really crowded on weekends. We were there only for a drink. The stout beer is very good...with a hint of coffee and burnt caramel in it. And just coz I was curious, we ordered their dark chocolate decadence...n it sure was very very delicious!
Very good waiter Mr.Arun and . had a very good time and Mr.Arun was very proactive and suggested us some good meals from the menu. 😁 Will come again .
Worst dj ever
Excellent service by Arun bhai. Keep up the good work!Thank you for the service.Pizzas were pretty good but the ambience could be improved. A separate dance floor would be appreciated.

This is my 2nd visit to this place. Abhishek n Suzanne were serving us. Both were very friendly, quick at service and recommended good beers. Food is really good as always. We had crispy fried lotus stem, curry leaf prawns, wok tossed chilli fish n peri peri chicken tikka. All the dishes were delicious. Nice place to chill out with friends, had a great time.

review.review_text: Ordered food through Zomato, got delivered after 95 minutes. To get deliver this, Called many times  the restaurant and approached Zomato.  They restaurant did not manage the order properly . It could be the reason, they might not focus on delivery order, since the restaurant person took 5 minutes to understand my order pending status,  The food quality is very normal. The quantity was very less for amount paid. It is a bad experience.

Very prompt service...nice place,. Good drinks great beer ......,................Vijay Singh was very punctual and great on the service end.all in all great experience  Amazing place to hand out with friends and family. Would recommend people to come in with your loved ones Great family place.
Joy Krishna and Bijoy has been extremely cordial and at our service throughout. I would give a 10/10 starting from initial welcome to final service. Thanks for extremely good service!
Love the ambience and food is awesome!Love it .LOVE THE SERVICE GIVEN BY BANTEI ..Had nice times with my frens!we tried triple beer and Ended up taking 5 glasses.Love the chicken wings n nachos .

Anup was amazing food was good I'll come again again Table took time but everything was good Ambience was slplendid Drinks are cheap so are the cocktails

review.review_text: Great ambience, didn't try much starters, dumplings were good.. I think this place will be amazing and will come back to give 5 🌟 once they start brewing their own beer..  One of the best ambience for Bangalore weather.. lovely place.

review.review_text: Pretty solid crowd. The food was finger licking good and so is the arrangements. Weekends are over here is really jam packed so plan accordingly.

Been to this place 4 times already in 9 months and it has never dissapointed. The burgers here are too delicious and the service and ambience are commendable as well. This is a must go place for anyone in bangalore. Its too bad thats they don't have an outlet in Whitefield because i intend to try each and every item on the menu....

Excellent food at a very good and affordable price. Ambience is good as well, staff is very customer friendly. Have visited this place many times and it never fails to deliver. Best to hangout with friends and family :)

Just loved the burgers here 😍 you guys should try the passion fruit mojito here, its really tasty 😋 I couldn't get a chance to try the deserts as i was full after having a double veg cottage cheese burger, but am sure they are as yumm as the rest of the food here, definitely gonna visit again especially to try the desserts.  Apart from these peri peri chicken burger XL (4.7/5) and ferrero rocher milk shake ( 4.5/5) were ordered..

review.review_text: Oh I love this place. I can visit this one again and again. It's great in terms of everything, food, ambience and service. Must visit if you love beer

Loved the ambience of the place.  The beers were crisp and good. We were happy we got there early as it got really crowded later.  Food was great. Cocktails were the only let down. My friend sent one back and the replacement one was also bad. She just had beer then.  You should try the pizza. Just order a slice of what you like.  I would go there again for the beer + ambience
Wonderful place with beautiful ambience ❤️ Had a great time with my friends 😍  Loved coffee flavoured beer and liquid cocaine 😁 I would definitely recommend it to my friends☺️

We've been here on multiple occasions, and just adore this place to bits. The ambience is one of the best in the city and the brews are also just amazing. Have to try the chocolate brew, and the Irish one also. Food was great too, which is an additional advantage. They have a smoking area also within the premises, and they have dogs roaming around also. All in all, love this place and will keep coming here forever!!

As much as I love the food and drinks here, I'm disappointed today cause I specifically called and asked the people here if they would be showing the premier league match and cause of that, I dragged myself and my friends here excited. Only to be disappointed that they don't screen any match in spite of having "live match screening" written here on zomato and my call as well.  Kinda super disappointed you would pretend to have all that to attract customers and then not do anything about it.

restaurant.name: Brahma Brews

location.address: 24th Main, 7th Phase, Opposite Brigade Palm Springs, JP Nagar, Bangalore

restaurant.cuisines: Bar Food, Asian, Italian, North Indian, Pizza, South Indian

review.review_text: I met Mr. Yashwant at BhramaBrews and his overall service was excellent.. He exactly suggested me the dishes what ivwas looking for.. Dishes were really good.. overaal experience was veey very good..

A great place to hangout. Their USP lies in the following   Staff are very friendly. We interacted with sherpa. What a guy. He is an asset to brahma brew.  2. The beer. ESP Belgian blonde (6.8%)  Please don’t stop this. The funny part is this beer is not part of menu. One has to ask the for this. Brahma brew. Please put this in menu. This should be your USP. u really have a good beer with good taste. Why haven’t u put this in menu.  3. The ambience. I love the place. No loud music. U can talk to ur loved one a and enjoy the beer.

Once upon a time beer used to be amazing here-in fact one of the best beers in Bangalore. Their Apple Cider, Weizenbock, was as good as any international craft. I have had such beer only in Belgium- Brussels and Bruges to be precise. But from about a month ago the apple cider started tasting bitter and soulless. I informed the staff and was assured of better quality. After confirmation from a senior person, I got assurance that a new batch had been brewed and was good- but alas!  When I visited today with hope to enjoy a nice mug of apple cider - I was sadly disappointed. Same bitter stale taste. Apparently the old stock had not finished yet. Wow! Spoilt my evening.
Good food served with high range of quality and quantity both #Good service and polite staff #Good Environment and ambience . Loved the different sitting option-non smoking n smoking zone .

event.description:

Your search ends here at Levitate!

Group bookings of 20++ pax and over can book an exclusive experience in our Rooftop & Mezzanine areas.

Queries: fnb@levitatebrew.in
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

review.review_text: Service was very heart whelming great ambience..everyone providing service here is humble and reach out in need we are flabbergasted by the entire dine Inn experience thanks for ujjawal for being so receptive. However music needs to better.. Thank you 😊
Bappa was a super attentive waiter!!

I thoroughly enjoyed my visit here. After indiranagar now JP Nagar is the place to be. I really liked most of their starter. We were so full after their amazing flavourful starters that we couldn't try their main course as much. Do try their Pizzas though, as they are too good. I am not a dessert person but their tiramisu n gems was pretty awesome.

Located in the 3rd phase of JP Nagar, Levitate is a huge microbrewery spread over two floors and gives a view of Vega City Mall from the rooftop.  I visited this place on a Tuesday evening with few of my friends for dinner. Among the house brews that they serve, I loved the Brew Masters Special,i.e., Lager Strong and the Gin based Grapefruit Negroni cocktail.  Some of the unique starters that we enjoyed were Gulabi Seekh Kebab and Masala Papad Crunch Fish Tikka where the fish was covered with papad was scrumptious in taste. If you are Upma lover, then Rawa Upma Cheese Balls is the dish for you to order here. Bacon Wrapped Potato bites was another mouth-watering item on the menu which literally had a layer of cheese sauce topped over it.🤤  Amid the large plates that we had, me being a hardcore non-vegetarian, loved the Farmer's Cottage Cheese Steak with Madras Curry Sauce. Middle Eastern style Lamb Chop served with olive mashed potatoes was also a delight to our mouths.😋  We were so full with the starters that we settled for the basic dal makhani with naan for the main course which was a great decision.  Ending our dinner with the desserts, we had Tiramisu(my favourite) and Molten Cake with Vanilla ice cream.  Do visit this place and share with me what all you liked here.😋

location.address: Astra Hotel, 2795, 27th Main, Sector 1, HSR, Bangalore

review.review_text: Either people don't know how to review our they don't care. This restaurant is just about ok, we went there for a team party. The staff were polite and prompt.  However the food and drinks just average. They didn't even have some of the beers and wines they mentioned in the menu.  The good part was the happy hours which helped us to have a much lower bill

The place is nice.. With good and light music and nice ambience.. If you wish to spend nice evening with loved ones over a pint of beer or mocktail may be, then this is the place.. Anoop helps us with the options we should try and we weren't disappointed. Worth visiting if you wish to talk more than dance.. :)
@kartik : Excellent service...The food was exceptional along with three service and ambience... would love to busy again... best for official parties and get together

Got served by Manil. Had an amazing dine out with my friend plus it was his birthday. Tried chef special butter chicken with khamir roti. Definitely the best butter chicken i have had in Bangalore. Definitely a must go again place !
Great service by sanga and deep! Good food quality and taste is awesome and ambience is well structured.☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️

location.address: 635, 100 Feet Road, Koramangala 6th Block, Bangalore

restaurant.cuisines: Street Food, Desserts, North Indian, Mithai, Rajasthani

review.review_text: I just landed Bangalore and was looking for some north Indian food.. and trust me this place stole my heart.. awesome food.. u will forget that u r in South India.. I'm glad this place is near to my hotel. Well done KK.. and keep it up.  P.S : Packaging in potli is great innovative idea 👏👏
Amazing food... Specially the kachories and dhokla... Iam new to this place so was excited after seeing ghewar in bangalore... Must try-- kota kachori, ghevar, dal bhati meal...

Kota kachori, Koramangala Bangalore.  Ordered chole bhature and laccha Rabdi sweet. Taste was good. But gravy taste was not up to the mark. But Rabdi was excellent. Must recommend: laccha Rabdi. Packing also quite good.  Food : 4/5 Quality : 3.5/5 Price: 5/5 Package :4/5

Tried Kota Kachori for the first time and I wasn’t disappointed. I had ordered Sabudana Vada and Raj Kachori and they stood up-to the mark! The vada was soft inside and crispy on the outside. Raj Kachori was a tad bit sweet but not too bad. And this place is extremely pocket friendly. Would definitely visit next time to try the Onion Kachori and Pav Bhaji. Looked really tasty on others’ plates :P
The best sweet and chat shop in town ...pure Rajasthani flavor...the Raj kachori is to die for. If you have a sweet tooth this place is a must visit

review.review_text: It was a awesome time spent here. Every time music goes better as I'm observing since long time from here. Specially manager Rajesh was very responsive in getting things in time n place. Service n food was great to. Thanks for serving dear Pallet.
The place is lit af!! Balraj was very attentive and service was top notch. Absolutely love this place!! Should come here during Bollywood night. It was lit af!!
Balram was the very attentive and we had the best service from him. The ambience was above expectation . The best thing about the place is the people .
I have visited to this place...i like it wow...i will say deepak manager is very friendly...and so helpful so i want give him 100% efforts for the pallet...really i like his behavior at all .thanks
Kailash service verry good....will visit next time again for sure . The best family pub for Whitefield. Guys you must visit it. All the best

location.address: 607, Ground Floor, 12th Main, Hal 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore

review.review_text: AMAZING PLACE! The music is at the perfect level of loudness so as to enjoy it and allow you to talk as well. Bhagyadhar was especially polite and a perfect host, we really enjoyed his presence and advice over food. The ambience is conducive to a nice date in evening with your significant other. We had the samosa soup, pan fried rice dumplings and dry chop suey, and were not disappointed with the quality of food as well! Do recommend this for anyone looking to have a fine dining experience.

Excellent food, great hospitality...we tried panfried rice dumplings, samosa soup, noodles and avacado ice cream...all were great, samosa soup is a must try...but felt the prices are towards the higher end, especially for desserts and ice creams.Please make sure to book table much prior.l,we went on a saturday afternoon without booking and had to wait for an hour.

The food is really good specially the samosa soup and raw mango salad. For those who like the food cooked in coconut oil/milk, try the creamed corn with paratha. One of the staffs bhagyadhar was very courteous and helped us through making the choice according to our taste. Kudos to him!

Right from the decor to the service and of course, the food, Burma Burma deserves an excellent rating. Such delicious and flavorful food in Burmese cuisine is a treat to the taste buds. It's an experience one shouldn't miss. Who said vegetarian food isn't tasty? Burma Burma is a testament to excellent Asian vegetarian cuisine!

*BURMA BURMA* A fine dining vegetarian restaurant with Burmese cuisine, @burmaburmaindia swept me off my feet with its decor, service and fantastic menu and taste. Never realised how versatile vegetarian food could made to be. In pictures: ¶SALAD SAMPLER - Crispy lotus stem, fermented tea leaves and mock meat salad. ¶KHAO SUEY ¶BUBBLE TEA ¶AVOCADO ICE CREAM I cannot recommend the food enough, it was bursting with flavors and it was so difficult to decide our orders.The salad was very unique and my favorite was the crispy lotus stem. Broccoli never tasted as good as it did in the Khao Suey. You can tell that the ingredients are so fresh and there is no compromise in quality .The avocado ice cream was just perfect and I could actually taste the fruit. If anything, the bubble tea was not something I would recommend, I've had much better than a milkshake with tapioca pearls. Do let me know if you try any of my recommended restaurants.Thank you for being my +1, my darling @monicapillai. For more food reviews and recommendations, follow @the_halal_lifestyle. #foodblogger #notsponsored #foodreview #bangalore #india#zomatobangalore #zomato#bangalorediaries #vegetarian #burmaburma#burmesecuisine#khaosuey#salad#finedining#expatmom #indiranagar#feedback #goodfood

restaurant.name: Biergarten

location.address: 2, Doddanekkundi, Whitefield Road, Mahadevpura, Whitefield, Bangalore

restaurant.timings: 12 Noon to 12 Midnight (Mon-Thu, Sun), 12 Noon to 1 AM (Fri-Sat)

review.review_text: Very good service,,,,with ppl like Deepak debnath ......polite, attentive,,,,,all overall great....Overall very good place.. Very good restaurant to visit
Must visit for great beer, service and an all round experience! The hefeweizen was one of the best I've had in the city. Shout out to the attendant to our table Deepak for his great service!
I really liked the beer and stuff. Service was really good by deepak. Ambiance was good. lit was really awesome. I would like to visit again.
Sukesh is nice and good Supporting staff, explained food made of and give good service. Recommand to visit biergarden for families  Fg Heidi fhkjffvvdcvh
This is another hangout for Whitefield IT peeps out there, I really enjoyed the live band and microbrewery beers .. taps boosted me up and food is awesome ! Love to be here time and again !

restaurant.name: Empire Restaurant

location.address: 103, Industrial Area, 5th Block, Near Jyothi Nivas College

restaurant.cuisines: North Indian, Mughlai, South Indian, Chinese

review.review_text: Empire is one restaurant in which we can blindly order any food menu without previously experiencing the same. Squid fry, Grilled chicken are the one's which i like the most, Tawa chicken shawarma is another variety dish to try out. Blue kulukki and other mocktail sections are also good and we get it at a fair price. I love taking food fron Empire :)

Well this 3 star is for service we had not for the food, as wanted try tandoori and grills we decided to visit this place today, firstly we ordered pepper chicken which was literally not so hot and we requested to make it hot and they added lots of pepper and water and made it look like gravy, and tandoori was actually not fresh matlab we could smell that spoiled smell of chicken (inside layers of meat), haryali tikka was okay okay, but coin parota was really good thats the only good thing we enjoyed

The worst staff ever! They really don’t even care - our manager first lied to us stating there wasn’t kebab, while clearly the other tables were getting it! Then he took so long, forgot an item and was very rude to us. Don’t bother coming here
